content: Don't get me started on security. I have personally, as a consultant, walked into the nuclear medicine department of a major hospital and gained access to enough material to make a very nasty mess. No one noticed or challenged me if they did. Unfortunately most people won't tolerate the inconvenience of good security. Goes to my argument of taking it to them where ever, who ever them is, are, they. Well you know what I mean!
